languages.text: {n}Маражай злобно скалится.{/n} "Хорошенько развлечься. Друкари, вынужденные прятаться в реальном мире? Полагаю, это забавное зрелище. Мы прибудем туда, выясним, какую нелепую засаду для меня устроили, а затем — вырежем их. Всех. Если Опустошительная буря пала... что ж. По праву Эзирраеш я положу ей окончательный конец".

traits.locale_text: "Хорошенько развлечься. Друкари, вынужденные прятаться в реальном мире? Полагаю, это забавное зрелище. Мы прибудем туда, вырежем тех, кто встанет на нашем пути, возьмем пленников для забавы позже... почему бы и нет?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sneers.{/n} "Have some fun. The Drukhari forced to hide in realspace? I suppose it will be an amusing sight. We will get there, find out what ridiculous ambush they have set up for me, and then we will cut them down. To the last warrior. If the Reaving Tempest has truly fallen... so be it. By my right as an Aezyrraesh, I will end it."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай злобно скалится.{/n} "Хорошенько развлечься. Друкари, вынужденные прятаться в реальном мире? Полагаю, это забавное зрелище. Мы прибудем туда, выясним, какую нелепую засаду для меня устроили, а затем — вырежем их. Всех. Если Опустошительная буря пала... что ж. По праву Эзирраеш я положу ей окончательный конец".

I will end it by the right of Aezyrraesh."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai verzieht verächtlich das Gesicht.{/n} "Mich amüsieren. Die Drukhari, die sich im Realraum verstecken? Das wird gewiss ein spaßiger Anblick. Wir fliegen hin, finden heraus, welchen erbärmlichen Hinterhalt sie vorbereitet haben, und dann vernichten wir sie. Bis auf den letzten Krieger. Wenn der plündernde Sturm wirklich gefallen ist ... dann sei dem so. Bei meinem Recht als Aezyrraesh, ich werde ihm den Rest geben."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sneers.{/n} "Have some fun. The Drukhari forced to hide in realspace? I suppose it will be an amusing sight. We will get there, find out what ridiculous ambush they have set up for me, and then we will cut them down. To the last warrior. If the Reaving Tempest has truly fallen... so be it. By my right as an Aezyrraesh, I will end it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai verzieht verächtlich das Gesicht.{/n} "Mich amüsieren. Die Drukhari, die sich im Realraum verstecken? Das wird gewiss ein spaßiger Anblick. Wir fliegen hin, finden heraus, welchen erbärmlichen Hinterhalt sie vorbereitet haben, und dann vernichten wir sie. Bis auf den letzten Krieger. Wenn der plündernde Sturm wirklich gefallen ist ... dann sei dem so. Bei meinem Recht als Aezyrraesh, ich werde ihm den Rest geben."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋冷笑道。{/n}“我打算找点乐子。黑暗灵族被迫藏身在真实世界？我认为这样的景象应该会非常有趣。我们应该赶到那里，看看他们为我设了什么荒唐的埋伏，然后我们就可以把他们全都干掉，一个不剩。如果狂风阴谋团真的灭亡了……那就让它灭亡好了。我会以艾泽拉什家族成员的权利，亲手将它了结。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sneers.{/n} "Have some fun. The Drukhari forced to hide in realspace? I suppose it will be an amusing sight. We will get there, find out what ridiculous ambush they have set up for me, and then we will cut them down. To the last warrior. If the Reaving Tempest has truly fallen... so be it. By my right as an Aezyrraesh, I will end it."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋冷笑道。{/n}“我打算找点乐子。黑暗灵族被迫藏身在真实世界？我认为这样的景象应该会非常有趣。我们应该赶到那里，看看他们为我设了什么荒唐的埋伏，然后我们就可以把他们全都干掉，一个不剩。如果狂风阴谋团真的灭亡了……那就让它灭亡好了。我会以艾泽拉什家族成员的权利，亲手将它了结。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai ricane.{/n} « M'amuser un peu, voyons. Les Drukharis obligés de cacher dans l'espace réel ? L'image est cocasse. Nous irons découvrir l'embuscade ridicule qu'ils m'ont préparée et puis nous les massacrerons. Tous, jusqu'au dernier. Si la Tempête ravageuse est vraiment tombée... qu'il en soit ainsi. Je l'achèverai, au nom des Aezyrraesh. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sneers.{/n} "Have some fun. The Drukhari forced to hide in realspace? I suppose it will be an amusing sight. We will get there, find out what ridiculous ambush they have set up for me, and then we will cut them down. To the last warrior. If the Reaving Tempest has truly fallen... so be it. By my right as an Aezyrraesh, I will end it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai ricane.{/n} « M'amuser un peu, voyons. Les Drukharis obligés de cacher dans l'espace réel ? L'image est cocasse. Nous irons découvrir l'embuscade ridicule qu'ils m'ont préparée et puis nous les massacrerons. Tous, jusqu'au dernier. Si la Tempête ravageuse est vraiment tombée... qu'il en soit ainsi. Je l'achèverai, au nom des Aezyrraesh. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se burla.{/n} «Divertirme un poco. ¿Drukhari obligados a esconderse en el espacio real? Será un espectáculo entretenido. Iremos, veremos qué lamentable emboscada me tienen preparada y los despedazaremos, hasta el último guerrero. Si la Tempestad Asoladora de verdad ha caído... que así sea. Por mi derecho como Aezyrraesh, le pondré fin».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sneers.{/n} "Have some fun. The Drukhari forced to hide in realspace? I suppose it will be an amusing sight. We will get there, find out what ridiculous ambush they have set up for me, and then we will cut them down. To the last warrior. If the Reaving Tempest has truly fallen... so be it. By my right as an Aezyrraesh, I will end it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se burla.{/n} «Divertirme un poco. ¿Drukhari obligados a esconderse en el espacio real? Será un espectáculo entretenido. Iremos, veremos qué lamentable emboscada me tienen preparada y los despedazaremos, hasta el último guerrero. Si la Tempestad Asoladora de verdad ha caído... que así sea. Por mi derecho como Aezyrraesh, le pondré fin».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイが嘲笑う。{/n}「楽しむさ。デュカーリが無理矢理リアルスペースに隠されただって？面白いものが見れそうだ。そこへ行って、奴らがどんな馬鹿げた奇襲を仕込んだのか見てみるとしよう。そのあとに切り刻んでやる。最後の一人までな。もし略奪の嵐が本当に負けたのなら…それでいい。アエジレシュの名において、俺が終わらせてやる」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sneers.{/n} "Have some fun. The Drukhari forced to hide in realspace? I suppose it will be an amusing sight. We will get there, find out what ridiculous ambush they have set up for me, and then we will cut them down. To the last warrior. If the Reaving Tempest has truly fallen... so be it. By my right as an Aezyrraesh, I will end it."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイが嘲笑う。{/n}「楽しむさ。デュカーリが無理矢理リアルスペースに隠されただって？面白いものが見れそうだ。そこへ行って、奴らがどんな馬鹿げた奇襲を仕込んだのか見てみるとしよう。そのあとに切り刻んでやる。最後の一人までな。もし略奪の嵐が本当に負けたのなら…それでいい。アエジレシュの名において、俺が終わらせてやる」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai dudak büküyor.{/n} "Eğleneceğim. Drukhariler, gerçekuzayda saklanmak zorunda mı kalmış? O hâllerini görmek güzel olacak. Bana nasıl saçma bir pusu kurduklarını öğrenecek, sonra da son savaşçıya kadar onları doğrayacağız. Müfteris Kasırga gerçekten düştüyse... Öyle olsun. Bir Aezyrraesh olmanın bana verdiği hak ile işini ben bitireceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sneers.{/n} "Have some fun. The Drukhari forced to hide in realspace? I suppose it will be an amusing sight. We will get there, find out what ridiculous ambush they have set up for me, and then we will cut them down. To the last warrior. If the Reaving Tempest has truly fallen... so be it. By my right as an Aezyrraesh, I will end it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai dudak büküyor.{/n} "Eğlen biraz. Drukhari gerçekuzayda saklanmak zorunda mı kalmış? Neşeli bir manzaradır kesin. Oraya gideceğiz, bana nasıl saçma bir pusu kurduklarını öğreneceğiz, sonra da onları doğrayacağız. Tek bir savaşçı kalmayana dek. Müfteris Kasırga gerçekten düştüyse... Öyle olsun. Bir Aezyrraesh olmanın bana verdiği hakla, işini ben bitireceğim."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
